comments.creator: jimb@mozilla.com
comments.text: The Debug object (bug 636907) should provide watchpoint functionality to replace Object.prototype.watch. It should be possible to watch individual properties on specific objects, and all properties on a given object (bug 638044).
comments.raw_text: The Debug object (bug 636907) should provide watchpoint functionality to replace Object.prototype.watch. It should be possible to watch individual properties on specific objects, and all properties on a given object (bug 638044).
comments.author: jimb@mozilla.com
jorendorff@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
Jim has specified a new API for this:

  https://wiki.mozilla.org/Debugger
  search for "setObjectWatchpoint" and "setPropertyWatchpoint"

I will try to get this implemented next week. It should be straightforward since we can reuse the existing watchpoint code.

comments.text: Would Object.observe (bug 800355) cover all the needs here or will this bug require features that are not (and cannot be) part of the Object.observe feature?
